Section.Description:
You can add custom Profiler sections in your scripts with Profiler.BeginSample and Profiler.EndSample.
In standalone games, Profiler can dump all profiling information using Profiler.logFile and Profiler.enabled.
Profiler is only available in Unity Pro.

member.name: AddFramesFromFile
member.summary: Displays the recorded profiledata in the profiler.

member.name: BeginSample
member.summary: Begin profiling a piece of code with a custom label.

member.name: EndSample
member.summary: End profiling a piece of code with a custom label.

member.name: GetRuntimeMemorySize
member.summary: Returns the runtime memory usage of the resource.

member.name: GetMonoHeapSize
member.summary: Returns the size of the mono heap.

member.name: GetMonoUsedSize
member.summary: Returns the used size from mono.

member.name: supported
member.summary: Returns whether the profiler is enabled in the current build. (Read Only)

member.name: logFile
member.summary: Sets profiler output file in built players.

member.name: enableBinaryLog
member.summary: Sets profiler output file in built players.

member.name: usedHeapSize
member.summary: Heap size used by the program.
